statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
This is an easy problem, just for you to warm up.
  Give you three edges of a triangle. Can you tell me which kind of triangle it stands for?
If it��s a right triangle(ֱ��������), please output ��good��. If it��s a isosceles triangle(����������), please output ��perfect��. Otherwise, please output ��just a triangle��. You may suppose the input is legal.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line contains an integer t means the number of test cases.
The each case contains three integers a, b, c in a line which stands for the length of the three edges.
(0 <a, b, c < 300).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, output the answer in one line.

statement.title: Sample Output
statement.content:
good
perfect
perfect
just a triangle
